uniequip_00X_ABCDEF.name: Patrol Partner
uniequip_00X_ABCDEF.upgradeDescription: Can summon a Sand Beast within Attack Range for 25 seconds. The Sand Beast scouts the area and extends Ray's Attack Range. Ray will prioritize targets within the scouting area and deal increased Physical damage by {damage}. Sandbeast redeployment time {redeploy time}
